Name: BATYA
About the game: Batya, a first-person survival horror. A game about escaping a nightmare. You stumble through the narrow corridors of garage complex as the distant footsteps is heard. Batya is getting closer. But don't worry you have a handfull amount of items. Use them smartly and maybe you will able escape this nightmare. What a worst nightmare could be for a kid who tried please his father but fail. What a kind of nightmare a father can create for his child who tried his best. Batya is a true survival horror experience which aims to show that the most terrifying monsters of all come from the human you love. Batya is a horrific experience that will grip players from its opening thrills to its chilling denouement.
